title: I Have a Date with a Zombie - Novel Updates
author: 软软很萌
description: When the end of the world comes, how does the heroine sitting in a wheelchair survive? Is the resurrection of the living dead man-made or God’s will? She got up from her wheelchair after accidentally being bitten by a zombie. Meng Han, a childhood sweetheart, Mo Yun, a lonely and eccentric computer genius, Mu Ye, a warm-hearted pharmacist, and the dark-hearted Gu Shaoli. Everyone who approaches her has a purpose? Man, it doesn’t exist! Let’s see her rise above the clouds and dominate the heavens!>
